section.section:
If the Governor accepts the resignation of an officer who, at the time of the resignation, is under arrest, under charges, or returned to a military court for an offense, deficiency, or delinquency, the officer shall:
cease to be an officer; and
receive a discharge in a form that the Governor directs.

An officer who resigns under paragraph (1) of this subsection is not eligible to receive a commission unless the officer:
reenlists; and
performs at least 100% of duty in each year of the reenlistment for 2 successive years.
